Which warehouses currently stock tennis: SELECT w.warehouse_name, i.stock FROM dbo.inventory i JOIN dbo.product_categories pc ON i.parent_asin = pc.parent_asin JOIN dbo.products p ON i.parent_asin = p.parent_asin JOIN dbo.warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE i.stock > 0 AND (LOWER(pc.subcategory_1) LIKE '%tennis ball%' OR LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%tennis ball%');
Which warehouses currently have PlayStat: SELECT w.warehouse_name, i.stock FROM dbo.inventory i JOIN dbo.product_categories pc ON i.parent_asin = pc.parent_asin JOIN dbo.products p ON i.parent_asin = p.parent_asin JOIN dbo.warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE i.stock > 0 AND (LOWER(pc.subcategory_1) LIKE '%playstation 5%' OR LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%playstation 5%');
